description:
Zolulu, the assassin who considers himself Dororo`s arch-enemy, traps the rest of the Keroro Platoon so they can`t interfere as he engages Dororo in a duel to the death. Then Keroro tricks Natsumi into letting him "borrow" the house for a day. It`s for a TV show and involves the platoon making some renovations, which Natsumi doesn`t mind, until she learns the hard way that they`re of the "home defense" kind!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dororo, Ninja Approaching the Shadow / Natsumi, Exploration of the Construction of the Hinata Residence
ドロロ 忍び寄る影 であります / 夏美 日向家建物探訪 であります
